events.title: Genesis
events.subtitle: The annual RMI workshop for freshmen at NIT Trichy
events.content: Our annual workshop for the freshmen that serves as a platform to kindle their interest in Robotics. Various topics in Robotics are introduced that build a foundation for them to explore further. The workshop is structured for students to learn through hands-on-experience by building a bot combining multiple domains of Robotics.

events.title: InHoTTs
events.subtitle: Inter-hostel technical tournament
events.content: The annual inter-hostel technical tournament held in collaboration with Pragyan that provides an intellectual challenge and is a source of healthy competition between hostels. Participating teams build robots specific to problem statements and complete a set of tasks within predefined constraints, exhibiting technical prowess.

events.title: Following
events.subtitle: The annual flagship Robotics competition from RMI
events.content: Our annual Robotics competition that tests a variety of technical domains, providing an opportunity for the freshmen to innovate and build complex systems with a mix of twists and additional challenges, making the competition a huge dive into the world of line-followers and autonomous bots.

events.title: RMI Hackathon
events.subtitle: An inter-disciplinary hackathon series from RMI
events.content: A 24-hour hackathon,  held consecutive to  Following,  where participants work and build on solutions to problem statements with  hardware available from our inventory, within the short time-frame. The platform aims to prove that, sometimes Beauty lies in simplicity !

events.title: RoboVigyan
events.subtitle: The RMI x Pragyan robotics event
events.content: Conducted in collaboration with Pragyan, the annual technical fest of NIT Trichy,  this consists of a plethora of events for Robotics enthusiasts from various institutions to showcase their technical skills by competing against each other and proving their prowess in each of their desired domains.

events.title: Pragyan Exhibition
events.subtitle: The grand display of innovation and technology
events.content: Visit our stalls during Pragyan to take a peek at the exciting projects and get to know what  we have been building over the years.  Get mesmerized at what the future of technology holds for humanity !
